title: Global Biodiversity Information Facility (GBIF)

geoparquet-items.title: GeoParquet STAC items
geoparquet-items.description: Snapshot of the collection's STAC items exported to GeoParquet format.

table:columns.name: gbifid
table:columns.description: GBIF's identifier for the occurrence

table:columns.name: datasetkey
table:columns.description: GBIF's UUID for the [dataset](https://www.gbif.org/developer/registry#datasets) containing this occurrence

table:columns.name: occurrenceid
table:columns.description: See [dwc:occurrenceID](https://dwc.tdwg.org/terms/#occurrenceID).

table:columns.name: kingdom
table:columns.description: See [dwc:kingdom](https://dwc.tdwg.org/terms/#kingdom).  This field has been aligned with the [GBIF backbone taxonomy](https://doi.org/10.15468/39omei).

table:columns.name: phylum
table:columns.description: See [dwc:phylum](https://dwc.tdwg.org/terms/#phylum).  This field has been aligned with the GBIF backbone taxonomy.

table:columns.name: class
table:columns.description: See [dwc:class](https://dwc.tdwg.org/terms/#class).  This field has been aligned with the GBIF backbone taxonomy.

table:columns.name: order
table:columns.description: See [dwc:order](https://dwc.tdwg.org/terms/#order).  This field has been aligned with the GBIF backbone taxonomy.

table:columns.name: family
table:columns.description: See [dwc:family](https://dwc.tdwg.org/terms/#family).  This field has been aligned with the GBIF backbone taxonomy.

table:columns.name: genus
table:columns.description: See [dwc:genus](https://dwc.tdwg.org/terms/#genus).  This field has been aligned with the GBIF backbone taxonomy.

table:columns.name: species
table:columns.description: See [dwc:species](https://dwc.tdwg.org/terms/#species).  This field has been aligned with the GBIF backbone taxonomy.

table:columns.name: infraspecificepithet
table:columns.description: See [dwc:infraspecificEpithet](https://dwc.tdwg.org/terms/#infraspecificEpithet).  This field has been aligned with the GBIF backbone taxonomy.

table:columns.name: taxonrank
table:columns.description: See [dwc:taxonRank](https://dwc.tdwg.org/terms/#taxonRank).  This field has been aligned with the GBIF backbone taxonomy.

table:columns.name: scientificname
table:columns.description: See [dwc:scientificName](https://dwc.tdwg.org/terms/#scientificName).  This field has been aligned with the GBIF backbone taxonomy.

table:columns.name: verbatimscientificname
table:columns.description: The scientific name as provided by the data publisher

table:columns.name: verbatimscientificnameauthorship
table:columns.description: The scientific name authorship provided by the data publisher.

table:columns.name: countrycode
table:columns.description: See [dwc:countryCode](https://dwc.tdwg.org/terms/#countryCode).  GBIF's interpretation has set this to an ISO 3166-2 code.

table:columns.name: locality
table:columns.description: See [dwc:locality](https://dwc.tdwg.org/terms/#locality).

table:columns.name: stateprovince
table:columns.description: See [dwc:stateProvince](https://dwc.tdwg.org/terms/#stateProvince).

table:columns.name: occurrencestatus
table:columns.description: See [dwc:occurrenceStatus](https://dwc.tdwg.org/terms/#occurrenceStatus). Either the value `PRESENT` or `ABSENT`.  **Many users will wish to filter for `PRESENT` data.**

table:columns.name: individualcount
table:columns.description: See [dwc:individualCount](https://dwc.tdwg.org/terms/#individualCount).

table:columns.name: publishingorgkey
table:columns.description: GBIF's UUID for the [organization](https://www.gbif.org/developer/registry#organizations) publishing this occurrence.

table:columns.name: decimallatitude
table:columns.description: See [dwc:decimalLatitude](https://dwc.tdwg.org/terms/#decimalLatitude).  GBIF's interpretation has normalized this to a WGS84 coordinate.

table:columns.name: decimallongitude
table:columns.description: See [dwc:decimalLongitude](https://dwc.tdwg.org/terms/#decimalLongitude).  GBIF's interpretation has normalized this to a WGS84 coordinate.

table:columns.name: coordinateuncertaintyinmeters
table:columns.description: See [dwc:coordinateUncertaintyInMeters](https://dwc.tdwg.org/terms/#coordinateUncertaintyInMeters).

table:columns.name: coordinateprecision
table:columns.description: See [dwc:coordinatePrecision](https://dwc.tdwg.org/terms/#coordinatePrecision).

table:columns.name: elevation
table:columns.description: See [dwc:elevation](https://dwc.tdwg.org/terms/#elevation).  If provided by the data publisher, GBIF's interpretation has normalized this value to metres.

table:columns.name: elevationaccuracy
table:columns.description: See [dwc:elevationAccuracy](https://dwc.tdwg.org/terms/#elevationAccuracy).  If provided by the data publisher, GBIF's interpretation has normalized this value to metres.

table:columns.name: depth
table:columns.description: See [dwc:depth](https://dwc.tdwg.org/terms/#depth).  If provided by the data publisher, GBIF's interpretation has normalized this value to metres.

table:columns.name: depthaccuracy
table:columns.description: See [dwc:depthAccuracy](https://dwc.tdwg.org/terms/#depthAccuracy).  If provided by the data publisher, GBIF's interpretation has normalized this value to metres.

table:columns.name: eventdate
table:columns.description: See [dwc:eventDate](https://dwc.tdwg.org/terms/#eventDate).  GBIF's interpretation has normalized this value to an ISO 8601 date with a local time.

table:columns.name: day
table:columns.description: See [dwc:day](https://dwc.tdwg.org/terms/#day).

table:columns.name: month
table:columns.description: See [dwc:month](https://dwc.tdwg.org/terms/#month).

table:columns.name: year
table:columns.description: See [dwc:year](https://dwc.tdwg.org/terms/#year).

table:columns.name: taxonkey
table:columns.description: The numeric identifier for the [taxon](https://www.gbif.org/developer/species#nameUsages) in GBIF's backbone taxonomy corresponding to `scientificname`.

table:columns.name: specieskey
table:columns.description: The numeric identifier for the taxon in GBIF's backbone taxonomy corresponding to `species`.

table:columns.name: basisofrecord
table:columns.description: See [dwc:basisOfRecord](https://dwc.tdwg.org/terms/#basisOfRecord).  One of `PRESERVED_SPECIMEN`, `FOSSIL_SPECIMEN`, `LIVING_SPECIMEN`, `OBSERVATION`, `HUMAN_OBSERVATION`, `MACHINE_OBSERVATION`, `MATERIAL_SAMPLE`, `LITERATURE`, `UNKNOWN`.

table:columns.name: institutioncode
table:columns.description: See [dwc:institutionCode](https://dwc.tdwg.org/terms/#institutionCode).

table:columns.name: collectioncode
table:columns.description: See [dwc:collectionCode](https://dwc.tdwg.org/terms/#collectionCode).

table:columns.name: catalognumber
table:columns.description: See [dwc:catalogNumber](https://dwc.tdwg.org/terms/#catalogNumber).

table:columns.name: recordnumber
table:columns.description: See [dwc:recordNumber](https://dwc.tdwg.org/terms/#recordNumber).

table:columns.name: identifiedby
table:columns.description: See [dwc:identifiedBy](https://dwc.tdwg.org/terms/#identifiedBy).

table:columns.name: dateidentified
table:columns.description: See [dwc:dateIdentified](https://dwc.tdwg.org/terms/#dateIdentified). An ISO 8601 date.

table:columns.name: license
table:columns.description: See [dwc:license](https://dwc.tdwg.org/terms/#license). Either [`CC0_1_0`](https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/) or [`CC_BY_4_0`](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/).  `CC_BY_NC_4_0` records are not present in this snapshot.

table:columns.name: rightsholder
table:columns.description: See [dwc:rightsHolder](https://dwc.tdwg.org/terms/#rightsHolder).

table:columns.name: recordedby
table:columns.description: See [dwc:recordedBy](https://dwc.tdwg.org/terms/#recordedBy).

table:columns.name: typestatus
table:columns.description: See [dwc:typeStatus](https://dwc.tdwg.org/terms/#typeStatus).

table:columns.name: establishmentmeans
table:columns.description: See [dwc:establishmentMeans](https://dwc.tdwg.org/terms/#establishmentMeans).

table:columns.name: lastinterpreted
table:columns.description: The ISO 8601 date when the record was last processed by GBIF. Data are reprocessed for several reasons, including changes to the backbone taxonomy, so this date is not necessarily the date the occurrence record last changed.

table:columns.name: mediatype
table:columns.description: See [dwc:mediaType](https://dwc.tdwg.org/terms/#mediaType).  May contain `StillImage`, `MovingImage` or `Sound` (from [enumeration](http://api.gbif.org/v1/enumeration/basic/MediaType), detailing whether the occurrence has this media available.

table:columns.name: issue
table:columns.description: A list of [issues](https://gbif.github.io/gbif-api/apidocs/org/gbif/api/vocabulary/OccurrenceIssue.html) encountered by GBIF in processing this record. More details are available on these issues and flags in [this blog post](https://data-blog.gbif.org/post/issues-and-flags/).

msft:short_description: Global biodiversity observation records, documenting over 1.6 billion species occurrences
